translated: Also, one is sustained by the aspect of previous latent tendencies.üîΩThus, due to the cause of all perfect objects, one should give various drinks to all of these.

original: de ltar 'di rnams thams cad la gzung ba'i dngos pos dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rgyus btung bar bya ba sna tshogs pa rnam par sbyin par bya'o //üîΩbldag bya sna tshogs de bzhin du //
analyzed: de ltar 'di rnams thams cad la gzung ba'i dngos pos dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rgyus btung bar bya ba sna tshogs pa rnam par sbyin par bya'o // bldag bya sna tshogs de bzhin du //
translated: Various things to eat are also like that.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is explained by the words ‚Äúvarious things to eat are also like that.‚Äù

original: de ltar langs nas zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi lus rang gi gnas spong ste /
analyzed: de ltar langs nas zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi lus rang gi gnas spong ste /
translated: Having arisen in this way means that one abandons one‚Äôs own body and one‚Äôs own place.

original: de'i tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa mo can gyi mchod pa rnams rdo rje 'chang gis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa mo can gyi mchod pa rnams rdo rje 'chang gis byed pa'o //
translated: At that time, the offerings of the complete enjoyment body are made by Vajradhara.

original: lus kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi gang du byung ba de la zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi gang du byung ba de la zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: By the body, one enters into the place where the buddhas have arisen, which is the certainty.

original: slar yang smon lam gyis log nas 'khor lo bcu gnyis pa rnams su mchod pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin gyis dang rna tshogs pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod pa la sogs pa rnag rang gi slob ma rnams la chos 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: slar yang smon lam gyis log nas 'khor lo bcu gnyis pa rnams su mchod pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin gyis dang rna tshogs pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod pa la sogs pa rnag rang gi slob ma rnams la chos 'jug par byed do //
translated: Again, having returned by aspiration, in the twelve wheels, the offerings of the nature of Vajradhara and the various offerings by the wise, one engages one's own disciples in the Dharma.

original: de rnams kyi yang 'di rnams thams cad kyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyi mchod pa la sogs pa de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yang 'di rnams thams cad kyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyi mchod pa la sogs pa de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: And for them, all of these offerings of the heroes and heroines will be explained as they come.

original: 'dis bsgrubs pas dang lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa la sogs pas kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi tha mal pa'i dngos po'i phyir chos 'chad pa'i tha mal bar sems can rnams kyi yon tan gyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: 'dis bsgrubs pas dang lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa la sogs pas kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi tha mal pa'i dngos po'i phyir chos 'chad pa'i tha mal bar sems can rnams kyi yon tan gyi dbang gis so //
translated: By this, and by the natural and unnatural, etc., the Buddhas, due to the power of the qualities of sentient beings, teach the Dharma as ordinary things.

original: phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang sangs rgyas des longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs zhes bya ba'i //
analyzed: phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang sangs rgyas des longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs zhes bya ba'i //
translated: Even by mutual incompatibility, that Buddha is called the Enjoyment Buddha.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang ngo //
translated: By all worlds.

original: longs spyod @146a * //
analyzed: longs spyod @146a * //
translated: Enjoyment.

original: rdzogs pa'i sku'i dum bu me'i 'khor lo dang po'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sku'i dum bu me'i 'khor lo dang po'o //
translated: The first wheel of fire of the Enjoyment Body.

original: de ltar 'dir chang gi rgya mtsho dang de bzhin du bsil ba la sogs pa'i di rnams su rdo rje phag mo'i shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi 'khor lo gnyis rnams drug pa dang bcu gnyis pa rnams zhes bya ba'o /

translated: Thus here, in the ocean of beer and likewise in the cool ones, the two wheels of the nature of wisdom and method of Vajravarahi are called the sixth and twelfth.

original: da ni 'jam bu'i gling rnams su chu'i 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'jam bu'i gling rnams su chu'i 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the water wheel in the Jambu continent will be explained.

original: de nas de'i phyi rol du bshad par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste chu'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni chu'i dkyil 'khor las byung bas so //
analyzed: de nas de'i phyi rol du bshad par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste chu'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni chu'i dkyil 'khor las byung bas so //
translated: After that, it should be explained as outside of that, and so on. The so-called water wheel is because it arises from the water ma·πá·∏çala.

original: rdzu 'phrul che zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling las kyi sa chen po'i rang bzhin te de las gang byed pa de thams cad len pa ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul che zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling las kyi sa chen po'i rang bzhin te de las gang byed pa de thams cad len pa ste /
translated: Great magic means the nature of the great field of karma in the Jambu continent. Whatever is done there, all of that is taken up.

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'o //
translated: Buddhas and so on.

original: de'i phyir dkar po'i mdog ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dkar po'i mdog ces bya'o //

original: rang bzhin gyis dkar ba'i las rnams mdor bsdus pa 'thob ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dkar ba'i las rnams mdor bsdus pa 'thob ba'o //
translated: The nature of white karma is obtained in brief.

original: 'on kyang gling thams cad kyi rang bzhin ma lus par rtogs pa gang gi tshe de'i tshe rmongs pa dgu pas 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams g-yo dang sgyu la sogs pa la dga' ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'on kyang gling thams cad kyi rang bzhin ma lus par rtogs pa gang gi tshe de'i tshe rmongs pa dgu pas 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams g-yo dang sgyu la sogs pa la dga' ba rnams so //
translated: However, when all the natures of all the continents are fully understood, then at that time, due to the ninth delusion, the beings living in the Jambu continent who delight in deceit, pretense, and so on,

original: des rnal 'byor ma'i rigs 'di rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: des rnal 'byor ma'i rigs 'di rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on these clans of Yoginis.

original: sum cu rtsa drug rim pas zhes bya ba ni sdang ba'i las kyi rang bzhin thams cad rnam par nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug rim pas zhes bya ba ni sdang ba'i las kyi rang bzhin thams cad rnam par nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The thirty-six are in order, and are for the purpose of destroying all the natures of the actions of hatred, and for the purpose of becoming a clan of special distinction.

original: de'i rigs rnams kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rigs rnams kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: And those clans are in the Jambudvipa.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: sbre'u mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: sbre'u mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: The female weaver and so forth, up to

original: ka l'a zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: ka l'a zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: the kala.

original: de ltar 'dzam bu'i gling dum bu bcu gnyis bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de ltar 'dzam bu'i gling dum bu bcu gnyis bdag nyid can no //
translated: Thus, Jambudvipa is of the nature of twelve sectors.

original: de la re re'i dum bu'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas ji ltar bshad pa'i rim pa de rnams su yang 'khor lo 'di la gnas pa mo rnams kyi rang bzhin dang gnas la sogs pa lam de'i rnam par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la re re'i dum bu'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas ji ltar bshad pa'i rim pa de rnams su yang 'khor lo 'di la gnas pa mo rnams kyi rang bzhin dang gnas la sogs pa lam de'i rnam par shes par bya'o //
translated: There, in each sector, the dakinis and so forth, in the places explained in the sequence, should be known as the natures and locations, etc., of the wheels that abide in that path.

original: ba tsha zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yang gling 'di rnams su ba tsha'i rgya mtsho las ba tsha'i grong gling thams cad rnams su sbrang rtsi las sogs pas longs spyod kyi sa la rgya mtsho'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dang skye bo thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: ba tsha zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yang gling 'di rnams su ba tsha'i rgya mtsho las ba tsha'i grong gling thams cad rnams su sbrang rtsi las sogs pas longs spyod kyi sa la rgya mtsho'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dang skye bo thams cad kyi'o //
translated: The ‚Äúmilk ocean‚Äù is the ocean from which the milk continents are produced in all the continents of this world sphere. It is the place of enjoyment of honey, etc., for the beings of the ocean and for all beings.

original: drod gsher skyes zhes bya ba ni mdor byas pas 'di la ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di drod gsher skyes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: drod gsher skyes zhes bya ba ni mdor byas pas 'di la ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di drod gsher skyes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The ‚Äúwarm and moist birth‚Äù is the warm and moist nature of this Jambudvipa.

original: las des mi rnams mngal @146b skyes rnams kyi lang bsam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las des mi rnams mngal @146b skyes rnams kyi lang bsam par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that karma, humans are born from the womb.

original: de bzhin du me'i 'khor lor gnas pa mo rnams kyi drod gsher skyes kyi bsam dang mngal skyes kyi yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du me'i 'khor lor gnas pa mo rnams kyi drod gsher skyes kyi bsam dang mngal skyes kyi yang ngo //
translated: In the same way, the warm and moist birth of the women who dwell in the fire wheel, and the womb birth.

original: de ltar mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
translated: Thus, all characteristics are complete.

original: zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig gi gling thams cad phal pa dang gtso bo re re'i gling la gling thams cad kyi bsam pa'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig gi gling thams cad phal pa dang gtso bo re re'i gling la gling thams cad kyi bsam pa'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that in each of the continents, all the qualities of the continents are complete.

original: de ltar chu'i 'khor lo 'dzam bu'i gling gi don can longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gnyis ma'o //
analyzed: de ltar chu'i 'khor lo 'dzam bu'i gling gi don can longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gnyis ma'o //
translated: Thus, the water wheel, which has the purpose of Jambudvipa, is the two-fold enjoyment body.

original: da ni ba tsha la sogs pas bskor ba'i gzhi rnams rim pa ji lta ba rnams su ye shes kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi rnams su gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni ba tsha la sogs pas bskor ba'i gzhi rnams rim pa ji lta ba rnams su ye shes kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi rnams su gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the four wheels, beginning with the wheel of wisdom, are taught in the bases surrounded by salt, etc., in their respective stages.

original: de nas de'i phyi ro la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas de'i phyi ro la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, outside of that, etc.

original: de ltar 'khor lo bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang du son pa rnams des kyang 'dzam bu'i gling dang mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang du son pa rnams des kyang 'dzam bu'i gling dang mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the four wheels, which enter into Jambudvipa, are also said to be Jambudvipa, with all characteristics complete.

original: ye shes kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi kyil 'khor las byung bas de'i phyir kun nas yongs su bskor ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi kyil 'khor las byung bas de'i phyir kun nas yongs su bskor ba bzhin no //
translated: The so-called wheel of wisdom is the wheel of wisdom, and because it arises from the mandala, it is surrounded on all sides.

original: kha dog sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: Having various colors means having various natures.

original: lha ma yin mo rnams zhes bya ba ni des bskor ba la gnas pa mo rnams kyi rigs te des ni lha ma yin gyi rig so //
analyzed: lha ma yin mo rnams zhes bya ba ni des bskor ba la gnas pa mo rnams kyi rigs te des ni lha ma yin gyi rig so //
translated: The so-called female asuras are the classes of females surrounded by them, and by that, the asura classes are indicated.

original: rim pas zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dim pas g-yon ba dang g-yas ba'i sna'i kyil 'khor gyi yon tan nye bar bas gas pas so //
analyzed: rim pas zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dim pas g-yon ba dang g-yas ba'i sna'i kyil 'khor gyi yon tan nye bar bas gas pas so //
translated: In order means in the former order, by the qualities of the left and right nose mandalas.

original: 'dir gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir gsungs pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: thig le mchog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas rigs kyi gzugs can ma zhes bya ba'i bar du rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams lha ma yin mo rnams kyi rigs las byung ba chus bskor ba la gnas ma rnams so //
analyzed: thig le mchog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas rigs kyi gzugs can ma zhes bya ba'i bar du rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams lha ma yin mo rnams kyi rigs las byung ba chus bskor ba la gnas ma rnams so //
translated: The supreme bindu, and so on, up to the class of the goddess, the thirty-six yoginis arise from the asura classes, and they are the females who dwell in the water mandala.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'on kyang sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas dur khrod dang 'khor lo gsum rnams su dang / de bzhin du rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo bzhi rnams kyi rang sgo na gnas pa mo dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas dur khrod dang 'khor lo gsum rnams su dang / de bzhin du rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo bzhi rnams kyi rang sgo na gnas pa mo dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa gsungs pa /
translated: However, the conduct of the white lady, etc., who reside at the door of each of the four wheels of Vajravarahi, is taught in the charnel grounds and the three wheels in the manner explained previously.

original: rdo rje phag mo thig le'i gnas nas 'ongs nas shar gyi sgor re //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo thig le'i gnas nas 'ongs nas shar gyi sgor re //
translated: Vajravarahi comes from the place of the bindu and goes to the eastern door.

original: de la gnas pa'i dkar mo thig le'i gnas su 'gro'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i dkar mo thig le'i gnas su 'gro'o //
translated: The white lady who resides there goes to the place of the bindu.

original: sngon du bshad pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku dang chos kyi sku dag gis 'khor lo rnams za ba'o //
analyzed: sngon du bshad pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku dang chos kyi sku dag gis 'khor lo rnams za ba'o //
translated: The wisdom body and the dharma body of those explained previously consume the wheels.

original: de ltar tsoo r'i chu'i rgya mtshor dang / dri chen por rdo rje phag mo dang shes rab dang thabs kyi 'khor lo gnyis so //üîΩde bzhin @147a * //
analyzed: de ltar tsoo r'i chu'i rgya mtshor dang / dri chen por rdo rje phag mo dang shes rab dang thabs kyi 'khor lo gnyis so // de bzhin @147a * //
translated: Thus, in the ocean of Caurasi, there is Vajravarahi, and in Mahendra, there are the two wheels of wisdom and method.

original: du bet'a l'i drag po'i gling gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: du bet'a l'i drag po'i gling gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: In the same way, there is the wheel in the land of Bhadra.

translated: In the ocean of the beer lake of Ghasmari, there is the wheel of Vajravarahi.

original: slar yang pukka s'i bsil ba la sogs pa'i rir dang rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: slar yang pukka s'i bsil ba la sogs pa'i rir dang rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Again, on the mountains of Pu·π£kasa, ≈öƒ´ta, and so on, and on the mountain of VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´.

original: de ltar sha ba ra'i 'dzam khum bu'i gling gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de ltar sha ba ra'i 'dzam khum bu'i gling gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Thus, the wheel of the continent of Jamb≈´dvƒ´pa.

original: de bzhin du tsandal'i ba tshva dang / zho'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tsandal'i ba tshva dang / zho'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Similarly, the wheels of salt, soda, and milk.

original: do mbi na'i sgor gnas pa mo rnams dang de bzhin du dur khrod kyi lha rnams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: do mbi na'i sgor gnas pa mo rnams dang de bzhin du dur khrod kyi lha rnams zhes bya'o //
translated: The women who dwell at the gate of Dombƒ´, and likewise the gods of the charnel grounds.

original: lhag ma sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas thams cad bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i //
analyzed: lhag ma sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas thams cad bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i //
translated: The rest is to be done in all ways according to the previously explained procedure.

original: 'di ni mdor bsdus pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mdor bsdus pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: This is the wheel of gnosis in brief.

original: de ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Thus, the wheel of the enjoyment body, which has the nature of the three wheels.

original: de ltar yang rdo rje'i ri rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ra ba dang sna tshogs ba'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang rdo rje'i ri rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ra ba dang sna tshogs ba'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Thus, in the vajra mountains, the wheel of the ma·πá·∏çala enclosure, and the wheel of the various heroes and yoginƒ´s.

original: da ni sprul pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi thugs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gsungs pa /üîΩde nas de yi phyi rol bshad //
analyzed: da ni sprul pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi thugs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gsungs pa / de nas de yi phyi rol bshad //
translated: Now, the three-fold wheel of the mind, etc., of the nature of the emanation body is taught.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, the one outside of that is explained.üîΩThe one outside of that is explained means that the one outside of the wheel of the body is the wheel of the mind.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag gi sems kyi rtsol ba dag gis byung ba ste thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag gi sems kyi rtsol ba dag gis byung ba ste thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: This wheel of the mind means that it arises from the left and right efforts of the mind of all mandalas, and is the wheel of the mind.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'chang par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rigs las so //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'chang par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rigs las so //
translated: Clear means that it is the family of the yoginis who are the consorts of the yogins.

original: kha dog gnag ces bya ba ni me yis bskor ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs khi 'khor lo yang bo ;
analyzed: kha dog gnag ces bya ba ni me yis bskor ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs khi 'khor lo yang bo ;
translated: Black color means that the family of the yoginis who are surrounded by fire is the wheel of the mind.

original: / de ltar kun gyi rang bzhin mchog skyes pa //üîΩzhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: / de ltar kun gyi rang bzhin mchog skyes pa // zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: Thus, the supreme nature of all is born.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad sems kyi rtsol ba las te dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad sems kyi rtsol ba las te dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: All mandalas are from the effort of the mind. The nature of all mandalas is the ascertainment.

original: 'di'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: The wheel of yoginis is taught here.

original: klu mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas grul bum mo zhes bya ba'i bar du rnal 'byor ma'i rigs sum cu rtsa drug rnams so //
analyzed: klu mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas grul bum mo zhes bya ba'i bar du rnal 'byor ma'i rigs sum cu rtsa drug rnams so //
translated: The thirty-six types of yoginis, from the naga woman up to the ghoulish woman,

original: lha mo chen mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lha mo chen mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
translated: are easy to understand, beginning with the great goddess.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid //
translated: The nature of mind is pure.

original: ces bya ba ni de ltar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo de yang sems kyi rang bzhin dag par byed pa gang gi tshe rang bzhin thams cad kyi bar dang bar rnams su sna tshogs ba'i sdang ba'i sems can mi 'dod par 'gro'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de ltar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo de yang sems kyi rang bzhin dag par byed pa gang gi tshe rang bzhin thams cad kyi bar dang bar rnams su sna tshogs ba'i sdang ba'i sems can mi 'dod par 'gro'o //
translated: The wheel of yoginis, as explained, is the purifier of the nature of mind. When the various hostile beings go to the various directions,

original: de'i tshe thams cad du son pa'i 'khor lor 'dod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshe thams cad du son pa'i 'khor lor 'dod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: then the wheel is said to have gone everywhere.

original: de ltar rang bzhin spangs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa ste de yang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bdag med pa can zhes bya ba ni gnas @147b dang bral ba des de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i mes
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin spangs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa ste de yang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bdag med pa can zhes bya ba ni gnas @147b dang bral ba des de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i mes
translated: The ‚Äúouter‚Äù of the ‚Äúouter and inner‚Äù is the self-nature of the fire of the ripening of their karma.

original: bskor ba'i bdag nyid kyi sa'i phyi rol zhes bya ba ste ro'i lus lta bu bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i mes bsreg pa'o //
analyzed: bskor ba'i bdag nyid kyi sa'i phyi rol zhes bya ba ste ro'i lus lta bu bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i mes bsreg pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúfire‚Äù is the burning away of the self-nature of the body, which is like a corpse.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin gyis sdang ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin gyis sdang ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe wisdom of the nature of the Yoginƒ´‚Äù is the nature of the Yoginƒ´.

original: 'dis ji skad bshad ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dis ji skad bshad ba gsungs pa /
translated: This is what is said by the above.

original: thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid rang bzhin tsam gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid rang bzhin tsam gyi ye shes so //
translated: The nature of the characteristic of the selflessness of all is the mere nature of wisdom.

original: de yang mi bden pa ste dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang mi bden pa ste dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is not real, because all things are taught to be emptiness.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is said:

original: 'di rnams thams cad 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'dis sgo skyong ma gsungs so //üîΩgnas bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni dum bu dang bo ye shes kyi sku'i 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams de bzhin du bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su dang sgo bcu gnyis rnams su sgo skyong ma bcu
analyzed: 'di rnams thams cad 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'dis sgo skyong ma gsungs so // gnas bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni dum bu dang bo ye shes kyi sku'i 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams de bzhin du bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su dang sgo bcu gnyis rnams su sgo skyong ma bcu
translated: All of these are like this and so forth, and by this, the door-keepers are mentioned.üîΩThe four places are the places of the retinue of the wisdom body wheel in the first section. The twelve are the twelve doors and the places of the retinue of the three body wheel.

original: gnyis rnams so //
analyzed: gnyis rnams so //
translated: The twelve door-keepers are mentioned.

original: de'i phyir de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is summarized by thus and so forth.

original: de ji ltar zhe na gnas bzhi rnams slar yang bcu gnyis zhes bya bas chas phye ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na gnas bzhi rnams slar yang bcu gnyis zhes bya bas chas phye ba gsungs pa /
translated: How is that? It is said that the division by the phrase the four places again twelve is taught.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang stong pa nyid dang ye shes kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang stong pa nyid dang ye shes kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The wisdom is the four ma·πá·∏çalas of the wisdom wheel and the aspect of emptiness and wisdom.

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i dngos po nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni brtags pa dang gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi rim ba ji lta ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i dngos po nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni brtags pa dang gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi rim ba ji lta ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The four kinds are the four natures of the imagined, the relative, and the perfect, in the order of the emanation body, the body of communal enjoyment, and the reality body.

original: bzhi zhes bya ba ni gnas gsum rnams su stong pa nyid bcu gnyis rnams so //
analyzed: bzhi zhes bya ba ni gnas gsum rnams su stong pa nyid bcu gnyis rnams so //
translated: The four are the twelve kinds of emptiness in the three realms.

original: de ltar thog ma'i bzhi sprul ba'i gnyis pa bzhi longs sbyong rdzogs pa gsum pa'i bzhi chos kyi sku'i lhag ma bzhi ye shes kyi zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta ba yis zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar thog ma'i bzhi sprul ba'i gnyis pa bzhi longs sbyong rdzogs pa gsum pa'i bzhi chos kyi sku'i lhag ma bzhi ye shes kyi zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta ba yis zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, the first four are the emanation body, the second four are the body of communal enjoyment, the third four are the reality body, and the remaining four are the intuition body.

original: dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid //
analyzed: dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid //
translated: The Blessed One is the cremation ground.

original: ces bya ba ni thim pa dang longs spyod pa dang bdag tu byed pas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can rnal 'byor ma de la thim nas song ba zhes bya ba ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni thim pa dang longs spyod pa dang bdag tu byed pas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can rnal 'byor ma de la thim nas song ba zhes bya ba ba'o //
translated: The Blessed One himself is the cremation ground, because he has entered into that yoginƒ´ who is the nature of emptiness, empty of dissolution, enjoyment, and self-appropriation.

original: dbugs kyi 'pho ba'i dbye ba dang kun du spyod pas dbugs 'bab pa'i phyir sems rtsa de'i nang du bcom pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste rang gis chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs can de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: dbugs kyi 'pho ba'i dbye ba dang kun du spyod pas dbugs 'bab pa'i phyir sems rtsa de'i nang du bcom pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste rang gis chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs can de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The lord is so called because the mind is destroyed by the destruction of the breath in that channel, due to the division and activity of the movement of the breath.

original: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i sbrul pa'i 'khor lo dang po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i sbrul pa'i 'khor lo dang po'o //
translated: This is the first emanation wheel of the mind.

original: @148a * // da ni 'di'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: @148a * // da ni 'di'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the second emanation wheel of speech is stated here:

original: de nas phyi rol du gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
analyzed: de nas phyi rol du gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
translated: Then, outside, another and so forth.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams thams cad kyi 'khor lo rnams kyi rang rang gi ye shes gnyis su med pa'i dus rnams su 'dis dag gi tshogs rtog go //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams thams cad kyi 'khor lo rnams kyi rang rang gi ye shes gnyis su med pa'i dus rnams su 'dis dag gi tshogs rtog go //
translated: The wheel of speech is that all of these wheels are imagined by this wheel of the assembly of pure syllables at the time of the nondual gnosis of each of them.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i lha la sogs pa'i lus po'am rlung dang rnam par shes ba dag tu de dag gi 'khor lor bshad de /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i lha la sogs pa'i lus po'am rlung dang rnam par shes ba dag tu de dag gi 'khor lor bshad de /
translated: The body, or the wind and consciousness of the deities of this mandala of pristine awareness, are explained as their wheels.

original: rlung gis bskor ba'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: rlung gis bskor ba'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the middle of the circle of wind.

original: dmar dang btsod gyi  kha dog ces bya ba ni 'dod chags chen pos rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid rnam par shes pa dang rlung gi dbus su'o //
analyzed: dmar dang btsod gyi  kha dog ces bya ba ni 'dod chags chen pos rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid rnam par shes pa dang rlung gi dbus su'o //
translated: Red and purple color means in the middle of the consciousness and wind that are the nature of passion for great passion.

original: de ltar de la gnas pa mo rnams so //üîΩgtso zhes bya ba ba ni rigs sum cu rtsa drug rnams rang bzhin gyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar de la gnas pa mo rnams so // gtso zhes bya ba ba ni rigs sum cu rtsa drug rnams rang bzhin gyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, they abide there.üîΩThe principal ones means the yoginis of the thirty-six clans, who are the natural clan yoginis.

original: mchod bzhes bya ba la sogs pa nas las kun byed ma zhes bya ba'i bar rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo 'di che zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mchod bzhes bya ba la sogs pa nas las kun byed ma zhes bya ba'i bar rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo 'di che zhes pa'o //
translated: The great wheel of these, beginning with ‚Äúaccepting worship‚Äù and ending with ‚Äúaccomplisher of all actions,‚Äù is the natural wheel.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo 'dod chags chen pos rjes su chags pas che ba zhes bya ba ste rang gi rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs can ma sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du son pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo 'dod chags chen pos rjes su chags pas che ba zhes bya ba ste rang gi rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs can ma sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du son pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, the wheel of the yoginis is ‚Äúgreat‚Äù because of being passionate with great passion, and is ‚Äúof the nature of the Buddha‚Äù because of being of the nature of the various virtuous ones.

original: 'dis kyang ci gsungs par 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dis kyang ci gsungs par 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
translated: He also says what this means:

original: rang rang gi rnag bzhin spangs pas dngos su stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dngos po thams cad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi rnag bzhin spangs pas dngos su stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dngos po thams cad ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll things‚Äù are empty of their own nature, because of the abandonment of their own nature.

original: de'i phyir sa kun du 'od zer bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sa kun du 'od zer bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the eleventh stage is called the ‚Äústage of the Buddha,‚Äù because of being the light of all stages.

original: gdan bzhi rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa de'i rgyud du rab tu grags pa zhes bya ba ste lhag ma rtogs sla'o //

translated: ‚ÄúThe four seats‚Äù and so forth refers to the well-known tantra of the dakinis of primordial wisdom and so forth. The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni 'di'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di'i gsum pa sku'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'di'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di'i gsum pa sku'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /

original: de nas sku'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: de nas sku'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
translated: Then, the so-called body cakra, etc.

original: sku'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid can khams gsum pa sku'i rnam pa bskyed ba'o //
analyzed: sku'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid can khams gsum pa sku'i rnam pa bskyed ba'o //

original: gang gi tshe de'i tshe 'khor lo thams cad kyi sku'i mthar gyur pa ste sku'i nang du 'khor lo thams cad do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de'i tshe 'khor lo thams cad kyi sku'i mthar gyur pa ste sku'i nang du 'khor lo thams cad do //

original: de'i phyir sku'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la gnas te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sku'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la gnas te /
translated: Therefore, the body cakra abides in space.

original: ji ltar nam mkha'i nang nas sna tshogs pa yang dag par 'byung se /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha'i nang nas sna tshogs pa yang dag par 'byung se /

original: sna tshogs pa nang ni nam mkha'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa nang ni nam mkha'o //

original: @148b de bzhin du lus kyi nam mkha' nang las thams cad yang dag par byung ste /
analyzed: @148b de bzhin du lus kyi nam mkha' nang las thams cad yang dag par byung ste /

original: thams cad kyi nang du lus kyi nam mkha' zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyi nang du lus kyi nam mkha' zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Everything is within the so-called space of the body.

original: des 'di'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mdog can ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: des 'di'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mdog can ces bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúhis body, speech, and mind are of the color of space.‚Äù

original: dkar ba dang dmar ba dang gnag pa'i mdog gis dang sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas sna tshogs pa'i mdog ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dkar ba dang dmar ba dang gnag pa'i mdog gis dang sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas sna tshogs pa'i mdog ces bya ba'o //
translated: The various colors are the colors white, red, and black, and the colors of the body, etc.

original: dir rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma zhes bya ba ni rgyur ma zhes bya ba ni rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi ma la sogs pa'i bus su gang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma sum cu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: dir rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma zhes bya ba ni rgyur ma zhes bya ba ni rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi ma la sogs pa'i bus su gang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma sum cu rtsa drug go //
translated: Here, the yoginƒ´ cakravartin is the thirty-six yoginƒ´ cakravartins, who are the daughters of the mother of the CaturmahƒÅrƒÅjika class, etc.

original: de ltar 'dir kyil 'khor pa'i lha mo bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'dir kyil 'khor pa'i lha mo bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Thus, here one should visualize the goddesses of the ma·πá·∏çala.

analyzed: de'i rigs las byung ba nam mkha'i bskor ba la gnas ba mo rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Those born from her family, abiding in the sky ma·πá·∏çala, are the yoginƒ´s.

original: de ltar 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, here the yoginƒ´s are mentioned.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dbang po ma zhes bya ba'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ma'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dbang po ma zhes bya ba'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ma'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
translated: From the mother of the CaturmahƒÅrƒÅjika class, etc., up to the mother of the ƒ™≈õƒÅna class, one should know the thirty-six yoginƒ´ cakravartins, etc. This is easy to understand.

original: sa ni mos pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ni thog mar nam mkha' 'du shes can smon lam gyis de bzhin du de nyid kyi mthar thug pa can ma bcu gnyis dang mos pa spyod pa nam mkha'i 'khor lo rnams su kun nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo na
analyzed: sa ni mos pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ni thog mar nam mkha' 'du shes can smon lam gyis de bzhin du de nyid kyi mthar thug pa can ma bcu gnyis dang mos pa spyod pa nam mkha'i 'khor lo rnams su kun nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo na
translated: The stage called ‚Äúpractice of devotion‚Äù is the beginning, and the end of that is the twelve cakras of the space-conception aspirational prayer, and the wheel of space of the practice of devotion.üîΩThe wheel of samsara is in the abode.

original: gnas na'o // des ci der 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnas na'o // des ci der 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: What is that? It is said to be the wheel of samsara.

original: bcu gnyis po de 'khor lo'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bcu gnyis po de 'khor lo'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Those twelve are called ‚Äúthe form of the wheel.‚ÄùüîΩThe wheel of samsara is the wheel of emanation, the wheel of VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´‚Äôs machine, the twelve wheels, the nature of the diversity of reality.

original: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni de ltar sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams sna tshogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can rnams te des tu'i sbras ni nges par gzungs ba'o //

translated: The particle tu is for emphasis.

original: 'khor lo 'di ni gru bzhi ste //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'di ni gru bzhi ste //

translated: This is explained as follows: ‚ÄúHere, the one who has the notion of the emanation body, having the four bases of magic power, etc., the purities of the factors of enlightenment, etc., the ten powers, the four confidences,

analyzed: bzhi la sos pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i gzugs ri mo snga la sogs pa de de bzhin du bshad do //

analyzed: brgyad gnyis lha mo zhes bya ba ni bcu drug rnams kyis te mchod pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mchod pa byas ni /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor @149a * //
